label_psw_to_reset: Your password was reset, click here to set the new password
label_reset_psw_sbnweb: If you use SBNWeb credentials, the password must be reset by the SBNWeb service module
label_termini_privacy: I consent to the processing of my data
label_sicuro_nominare: Are you sure, do you want name
label_sicuro_eliminare: Are you sure do you want delete
label_sicuro_eliminare_ticket: Are you sure do you want delete request n.
label_sicuro_reimposta_psw: Are you sure do you want reset password for
label_cambio_psw_sbnweb: Changing this password will NOT change the SBNWeb password
label_termini_news_letter: I accept to receive inforation data via email
label_user_login_sbnweb: If you are registered with SBNWeb services you can use the same credentials
label_ticket_pubblico_policy: By checking this box you accept that the request is also visible to other users, who can answer you
label_condizioni: terms and conditions for the processing of personal data
label_sicuro_revocare_bib: You're sure you want to revoke the appointment of librarian
PSW_WRONG: Data not entered correctly. The password can not be changed
MESSAGE_ERROR: Successful operation but it was not possible to send the confirmation email
MESSAGE_MAIL_WRONG: Wrong email, check if the format is correct in your profile
PSW_NOT_SAME: The repetition of the new password does not match the one entered
FORM_USER_NUM_CHAR: The user must be longer than 4 characters and less than 10 characters
FORM_PSW_NON_SICURA: The password must contain at least 8 characters, including an uppercase letter, a lowercase letter, a number and a special character
ERROR_TICKET_EVASO_CONCORRENZA: The message can not be added because the ticket is already deleted or dealt with by another user
TICKETS_CON_CATEGORIA_ASSOCIATA: Unable to delete, at least one ticket is associated with this category
label_reimpoasta_psw_correttamente: Ti abbiamo inviato un’email per impostare una nuova password,  controlla la tua casella di posta
NOT_PSW_CAN_CHANGE_SBNWEB: Impossibile modificare la password: utenza associata ad account SBNWeb
label_testo_confirm_delete: Do you want to confirm the deletion?
UTENZA_NON_SBNWEB: User not associated with a SbnWeb account. Use the 'Reset password' button
BIB_NOT_FOUND: Library not found among those that expose the service in OPAC. To proceed with a manual entry, enter the name of the library
RICHIESTE_ASSOCIATE_BIB: There are requests associated with the library. You're sure you want to delete
COD_POLO_ERRATO: The pole code must be 3 characters
COD_BIB_ERRATO: The library code must be 2 characters
select_polo: Selezionare un polo tra quelli disponibili
